slide.title: Tidy Extension
slide.blurb: Tidy Extension is a wrapper around %libTidy% library, who's purpose is to clean, compact and convert between the various HTML variants.

list.title: Capabilities
list.bullet: Convert HTML 3 to HTML 4 to XHTML in a few lines of code
Find and extract portions of HTML documents using OO
Compact your page output using Tidy output buffer.
Convert HTML tags to CSS whenever possible.
